mapper.select: SELECT id,house_no houseNo,upload_time uploadTime,is_pay isPay,pay_time payTime,type,`month`, money,dosage,`explain` FROM ht_house_consume WHERE house_no=#{houseNo} AND type=#{type} AND is_pay=0 ORDER BY `month` ASC
